turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'd like to order some coffee to pick up at my local Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, which starbucks should i place the order at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It's on North Beach Street in Fort Worth, Texas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. and what did you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a tall, please.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get coconut milk with it?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $4.35 is the total. should i place the order now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i've placed the order. it'll b ready for u in 10 minutes. i've also sent u the receipt via text.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that will be all. Thank you.
